channel.title: The Anfield Index Podcast
channel.description: The Anfield Index Podcast for Liverpool supporters by Liverpool Supporters!
channel.itunes:summary: The Anfield Index Podcast for Liverpool supporters by Liverpool Supporters! All Liverpool FC related talk with plenty of stats and analysis from Liverpool fans on Twitter!
channel.itunes:author: AnfieldIndex.com

item.title: The Liverbirds Podcast: Episode 4 - He Drinks Sangria
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
It’s episode four of The Liverbirds Podcast and Kosha is stepping into hosting duties again this week. She has regulars Enzo and Nina to form part of her panel whilst the team welcome Darshni Nil, the host of the Indian AI Podcast, to the fray.

The ladies talk about their day at Anfield for the Dortmund game, the Southampton game, they rip into poor Lucas Leiva and Glen Johnson too! Rihanna gets it in the neck too and the ladies discuss the upcoming Manchester City game.
Darshni talks the ISL - a new Premier League in India where Liverpool cult hero Luis Garcia has joined the Kolkata franchise!
All this and more - It’s The Liverbirds Podcast!

item.title: Episode 40: It’s All About Henderson
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
This week on the Anfield Index Podcast we have Dave Hendrick as host with Gags, Gurminder Marwaha and Jay Patel on the show!

The lads talk Southampton in-depth with the Lucas selection causing many a headache. The full backs are discussed as well as who the panel wish to sign up next - which striker or which midfielder? On top of all of this Gags has his pressing stats return for the new season with a little bit of a twist!

All this and more… It’s the Anfield Index Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: International Supporters Edition: USA
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Our 9th International Podcast is from the United States of America!

Neil Tolley hosts with Ryan Zimbleman, Jon Moore and Jason Belk as guests!
They talk about the origin of their support, the recent American Tour (and players that stood out), how they watch the games, NBC’s unbelievable coverage in the USA and their expectations of the coming season!
All this and more… it’s the American Anfield Index Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: AIPodcast Australia: Episode 2
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
The Aussies are back with another episode from Down Under!

In this episode Ayrton hosts once again with Mick, Jonny, Sam and Nathan joining the fray!
They cover pre-season talk and transfers! What Centre-back pairing should be used, predictions for the Southampton game and predictions for this season. They also cover a dream signing they’d love to see in the last week of the window and whether Liverpool require another option for a forward?
Should Lucas and Agger be retained for squad depth or sold?
All this and more it’s the Australian AI Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Episode 39: Defensive Errors Analysis 13/14
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Another day, another podcast - our second AIPodcast this week is a special one with Dave Hendrick hosting the show.

We have Dan Rhodes and Hari Sethi analysing every goal that Liverpool conceded last season and creating their own statistics on the errors that led to the huge amount of goals shipped.
Who made the most errors? How can Liverpool improve? What type of errors were collected?
All this and a lot, lot more… it’s The Anfield Index Podcast.

item.title: Premier League Preview Show - Liverpool Vs Southampton Preview
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Welcome to a brand new show by The Anfield Index Podcast!


Jim Fishlock hosts this show speaking to Neil Poole, from the We Are Liverpool fanzine and Southampton supporter Richard Brereton.
They cover the exodus at Southampton and Richard gives his verdict on Liverpool new boys Lambert, Lallana and Lovren whilst they preview the opening Premier League fixture at Anfield with their predicted line ups and scores.
There’s also a bit of fun at the start with Neil Poole put through his paces by Jim Fish’s “Proper Liverpool Fan’ Quiz!
All this and more… it’s Anfield Index’s Premier League Preview Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: TTT Episode 3: Fluid Formations
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Host: Bob Pearce


Guests: Paul Tomkins, Chris Rowland, Daniel Rhodes and Mihail Vladimirov


Coutinho’s [...]
item.content:encoded:
Host: Bob Pearce


Guests: Paul Tomkins, Chris Rowland, Daniel Rhodes and Mihail Vladimirov


Coutinho’s breathtaking performance against Dortmund; problems pinning down the exact formation; fitting the attacking players within the system; a new tactical era of defeating the proverbial parked bus; the untypical target man; the perfect example of a balanced team; error-prone defensive machines; the busiest week of the season on The Tomkins Times and what goes into the match preview.

item.title: Episode 38: I.T.K.
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
This week on the Anfield Index Podcast we have John Ritchie returning as host with Dave Hendrick, Graeme Kelly and Jay Riley for an I.T.K. Special!

The lads talk pre-season, the Dortmund game (Sterling and Coutinho), Lovren’s performance, striker options, Daniel Agger’s position and what else could be in store in the transfer window!

All this and more… It’s the Anfield Index Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: International Supporters Edition: New Zealand
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Our eighth International Supporters special hails from New Zealand!

Cam Downer hosts the show with Andrew McGoff,  Kevin Divane and Sidd Arora as guests.

On this version of the AIPodcast they share their experiences and love for the club that unites us all - Liverpool Football Club. They also talk about the business LFC have done this summer, talk pre-season and look forward to the new s [...]
item.content:encoded:
Our eighth International Supporters special hails from New Zealand!

Cam Downer hosts the show with Andrew McGoff,  Kevin Divane and Sidd Arora as guests.

On this version of the AIPodcast they share their experiences and love for the club that unites us all - Liverpool Football Club. They also talk about the business LFC have done this summer, talk pre-season and look forward to the new season and the Champions League too.

All this and more… it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!

They also talk about the business LFC have done this summer, talk pre-season and look forward to the new season and the Champions League too.All this and more... it's the Anfield Index Podcast!

item.title: Episode 37: So Long Pepe
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
This week on the Anfield Index Podcast we have Gags Tandon, Dave Hendrick, Jan Gorski-Mescir and Marco Lopes talking all things Liverpool FC.

But before the lads talk about whether pre-season matters and have their say on Liverpool’s signings and whether Brendan Rodgers will play with a back three we have Steve Gennaro and Jon Moore appearing on the show to discuss their recent travels on the LFC American Tour with Gags.
The lads also pay tribute to the departing Pepe Reina talking about his best moments at the club and how well he served the club in his first five years there.
All this and more… It’s the Anfield Index Podcast!

item.title: LIKE A BOSS! South African AIPodcast Episode 2!
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
The South African Anfield Index Podcast team are back and how: LIKE A BOSS!

Ivan Ohlson de Fine hosts this time with Mike Krogh, Brent Venter, Kaylon Karrim and Lloyd Hicks all on the panel again!
They discuss the new signings, the possible need for marquee signings, pre-season games and injuries. They also play a little game with players called Keep, Loan or Sell!
All this and more it’s the South African Anfield Index Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: The Liverbirds Podcast Episode 3: 3 Is The Magic Number!
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
The ladies return with their third podcast to wipe away the jet lag!

Rae hosts this instalment as the girls discuss Steven Gerrard, LFC’s pre-season preparations for the Premiership campaign, Nina previews the Dortmund game… and footballers’ beards!
item.content:encoded:
The ladies return with their third podcast to wipe away the jet lag!

Rae hosts this instalment as the girls discuss Steven Gerrard, LFC’s pre-season preparations for the Premiership campaign, Nina previews the Dortmund game… and footballers’ beards!

All this and a lot, lot more… It’s the Liverbirds Podcast!

item.title: Anfield Index USA Tour Specials: LFC New York Supporters Club (@LFCNY)
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
A very special Anfield Index Podcast for you where Steve Gennaro and Gags speak to the Liverpool FC supporters club in New York (@LFCNY).

They speak to Nathan, Chris and Mike about the supporters club and cover their history, the 11th Street bar, their old podcasts, major contributors to the supporters group as well as their excellent work in the New York community as well as their excellent work with Liverpool Supporters in the surrounding area.
item.content:encoded:
A very special Anfield Index Podcast for you where Steve Gennaro and Gags speak to the Liverpool FC supporters club in New York (@LFCNY).

They speak to Nathan, Chris and Mike about the supporters club and cover their history, the 11th Street bar, their old podcasts, major contributors to the supporters group as well as their excellent work in the New York community as well as their excellent work with Liverpool Supporters in the surrounding area.

item.title: Brendan Rodgers Post-Match Press Conference Vs Manchester City
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
The Anfield Index Podcast continues in New York with Brendan Rodgers’ post match press conference after the Penalties win against Manchester City.

All this and more it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!

item.title: The Tomkins Times Podcast Episode 2
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description: The recent friendlies and what we have learnt. The role of midfielders within the 4123 formation that Rodgers is expected to use. How often Gerrard will play and in what role, including potential candidates to replace him as captain. Dejan Lovren signing for the club and how he fits into the side for the upcoming season. Martin Skrtel as Liverpool’s new false ten. The transfer window – are Liverpool doing anything different? Different types of managers and Rodgers the crazy genius.
item.content:encoded:
The recent friendlies and what we have learnt. The role of midfielders within the 4123 formation that Rodgers is expected to use. How often Gerrard will play and in what role, including potential candidates to replace him as captain. Dejan Lovren signing for the club and how he fits into the side for the upcoming season. Martin Skrtel as Liverpool’s new false ten. The transfer window – are Liverpool doing anything different? Different types of managers and Rodgers the crazy genius.

Host: Bob Pearce
Guests: Chris Rowland, Daniel Rhodes and Mihail Vladimirov

item.title: Brendan Rodgers Press Conference for Manchester City plus Kolo Toure
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Brendan Rodgers held a press conference for the New York City press ahead of the massive Manchester City game.

Rodgers answered questions on his tactics, Origi, life after Suarez, youth players, new signings, Loic Remy and the Liverpool comparison to Tottenham of last year… all this and much, much more.
item.content:encoded:
Brendan Rodgers held a press conference for the New York City press ahead of the massive Manchester City game.

Rodgers answered questions on his tactics, Origi, life after Suarez, youth players, new signings, Loic Remy and the Liverpool comparison to Tottenham of last year… all this and much, much more.

item.title: Anfield Index USA Tour Specials: New York City
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Our second #AIPodcast over on Liverpool’s USA Tour has supporters from New York City talking about their experiences of supporting Liverpool FC! 

The panel also discussed the Origi signing, Lovren’s position, whether Sakho deserves a first team spot, Daniel Agger and why the USA supporters call the game SOCCER!
item.content:encoded:
Our second #AIPodcast over on Liverpool’s USA Tour has supporters from New York City talking about their experiences of supporting Liverpool FC! 

The panel also discussed the Origi signing, Lovren’s position, whether Sakho deserves a first team spot, Daniel Agger and why the USA supporters call the game SOCCER!

Host: Steve Gennaro
Co-Host: Gags Tandon
Guests: Justin, JJ and Sandip

All this and more… it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!

item.title: Anfield Index USA Tour Specials: Chicago
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Our first #AIPodcast over on Liverpool’s USA Tour has supporters from around the United States talking about their experiences on the current tour! Their interactions with players and fans whilst Gags and Jonny talk about their experience as part of the Press Group for Liverpool’s pre-game press conference and training session in Chicago!

All this and more… it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!

Host: Gags
Guests: Jon Moore, Alex Perrin, Andrew Perrin, CJ Morales &amp [...]

Their interactions with players and fans whilst Gags and Jonny talk about their experience as part of the Press Group for Liverpool’s pre-game press conference and training session in Chicago!

All this and more… it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!

Host: Gags
Guests: Jon Moore, Alex Perrin, Andrew Perrin, CJ Morales & Aly Ghah.
item.itunes:subtitle: Our first #AIPodcast over on Liverpool's USA Tour has supporters from around the United States talking about their experiences on the current tour! Their interactions ...
item.itunes:summary: Our first #AIPodcast over on Liverpool's USA Tour has supporters from around the United States talking about their experiences on the current tour! Their interactions with players and fans whilst Gags and Jonny talk about their experience as part of the Press Group for Liverpool's pre-game press conference and training session in Chicago!All this and more... it's the Anfield Index Podcast!Host: GagsGuests: Jon Moore, Alex Perrin, Andrew Perrin, CJ Morales Aly Ghah.
item.itunes:keywords: Liverpool,Liverpool FC,Premier League,Anfield Index Podcast,Anfield Index
item.itunes:author: AnfieldIndex.com

item.title: Brendan Rodgers Press Conference for Olympiakos plus Brad Jones & Jack Robinson
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Anfield Index has arrived in the USA and we were present at the Press Conference before the Olympiakos game.


On this podcast you’ll be able to hear the full press conference with Brendan and Brad plus a quick conversation with Jack Robinson.

All this and more… it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: International Supporters Edition: India!
item.dc:creator: anfieldindex
item.description:
Our seventh International Supporters special hails from India!

Darshni hosts the show with Neil, Dhananjai, Meghana and Srikanth as guests.

On this version of the AIPodcast they share their experiences and love for the club that unites us all - Liverpool Football Club. They also talk Luis Suarez, Daniel Sturridge, and transfers!

All this and more… it’s the Anfield Index Podcast!
